=================================================


Top of the Lake is a 2013 television drama miniseries co-produced by BBC Two in the UK, UKTV in Australia/NZ and Sundance Channel in the United States.


Written and created by Jane Campion and Gerard Lee, and filmed and set in New Zealand, the series follows a detective investigating the disappearance of a 12-year-old pregnant girl. 

While visiting her dying mother in New Zealand, Detective Robin Griffin begins investigating the disappearance of Tui Mitcham, a twelve-year-old pregnant girl from the small town of Laketop.


1/6 Detective Robin Griffin searches for the truth about Tui, a twelve-year-old pregnant girl.

2/6 Robin's search in the wilderness for the pregnant Tui starts to uncover secrets.

3/6 Robin makes a breakthrough but Al warns that her past is colouring her judgement.

4/6 A violent indiscretion sees Robin thrown off the case but she can't let go.

5/6 Robin is back on the case, whilst Matt gathers troops to hunt his daughter down.

6/6 Matt reveals a secret that almost destroys Robin as the investigation reaches conclusion.





[b]Note
The BBC version was 6x60 minute episodes (360 mins)
Elsewhere versions  7x50 minute episodes (350 mins)

Because the BBC edits also include the (Stupid) Previsouly and Next on...
The 6 or 7 ep versions have the same total running time




[/b]
